price: L Nabiyow! Ku Rabbi dakanu leh у an marak kah abenna Matablannaa?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
